_meta.name: tutorial-quickstart
_meta.description: Brief quickstart guide for new users
_meta.use_case: New users need to get started in 5 minutes

sections.heading: # Quick Start
sections.prompt: Write a friendly 5-minute getting started guide (3-4 paragraphs). Cover: (1) What this project does in one sentence, (2) Prerequisites (just the essentials), (3) One-command installation, (4) Simplest possible first example. Be encouraging and beginner-friendly. Skip edge cases.

sections.heading: ## Your First Steps
sections.prompt: Provide 3-5 concrete first tasks a new user should try (bullet list format). Each task should be completable in under 2 minutes. Focus on building confidence through small wins. One sentence per task with the exact command to run.

sections.heading: ## What You've Learned
sections.prompt: Brief summary (2 paragraphs) of what the user accomplished. Celebrate their progress and point them to next resources (link to full documentation). Keep it motivating and short.
